'''Dew-Dipped Shrimp''' is a [[:Category:Special Dishes|special]] [[food]] item that the player has a chance to obtain by cooking [[Stir-Fried Shrimp]] with [[Yelan]]. The [[recipe]] for Stir-Fried Shrimp is obtainable from [[Verr Goldet]] at [[Wangshu Inn]] for 5000 [[Mora]].

Dew-Dipped Shrimp increases all party members' [[Shield]] Strength by '''35'''% for 300s. Like most foods, this has no effect for other players in [[Co-Op Mode]].
